channel.title: Morning Star Meadows Family Farm
channel.description: Recent content on Morning Star Meadows Family Farm
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2021 Morning Star Meadows Family Farm

item.title: Free-Range Turkey
item.description: Our Bourbon Red turkeys are a heritage breed that naturally hatch and are raised by their parents on our lush pasture.

item.title: Grassfed Beef
item.description: To buy this much beef is much more economical, yet it can require additional freezer space and it is a larger initial financial investment in your health.

item.title: Grassfed Lamb
item.description: To buy this much lamb is much more economical, yet it can require additional freezer space and it is a larger initial financial investment in your health.

item.title: Mineral
item.description: MSM Gold Mineral Mix Ideal for Cattle & Goats $46 / 50 pounds + $8 bucket & lid deposit (if needed)

item.title: Pastured Pork
item.description: To buy this much pork is much more economical, yet it can require additional freezer space and it is a larger initial financial investment in your health.

item.title: Sheep Wool & Fleeces
item.description: Our Clun Forest sheep are a heritage breed that is in danger of extinction. For this reason we have chosen to breed them to increase their numbers (not to mention they are great foragers, easy lambers, phenomenal mothers and, in general, great sheep)!

item.title: Soap
item.description: Our soaps are made with the fat from the animals we raise on our farm, including tallow (from cattle) and lard (from pigs).
